metadata.title: CVE-2020-35655 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Pillow before 8.1.0, SGIRleDecode has a 4-byte buffer over-read whendecoding crafted SGI RLE image files because offsets and length tables aremishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.4
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.4
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.4').
